SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectApprovalRes */ A.STR_ID AS STR_ID , A.STR_NM AS STR_NM , A.MBL_NO AS MBL_NO , B.CAMP_ID AS CAMP_ID , B.CAMP_NM AS CAMP_NM , C.INFO_DESC AS INFO_DESC , TO_CHAR(C.BGN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(C.END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , D.OFF_DESC AS OFF_DESC , D.OFF_TYP AS OFF_TYP , D1.OFFCPN_NM AS OFFCPN_NM , D1.CPN_TYP AS CPN_TYP , F.DTL_NM AS DTL_NM , D1.FRM_SEQ AS FRM_SEQ , D1.TO_SEQ AS TO_SEQ , D2.OFFGFT_NM AS OFFGFT_NM , E.CHL_DESC AS CHL_DESC , E.CHL_TYP AS CHL_TYP , E1.CHLEML_NM AS CHLEML_NM , E2.CHLSMS_NM AS CHLSMS_NM , A1.CTR_ID AS CTR_ID , A1.CTR_NM AS CTR_NM , B1.CAMP_ID AS REQ_CAMP_ID , B2.CAMP_ID AS RES_CAMP_ID FROM ARA_STR A LEFT JOIN ARA_CTR A1 ON A1.CTR_ID = A.CTR_ID , ARA_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA_APPRREQ B1 ON B1.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_APPRRES B2 ON B2.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID , ARA_CAMPINFO C , ARA_CAMPOFF D LEFT JOIN ARA_OFFCPN D1 ON D.CAMP_ID = D1.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_OFFGFT D2 ON D.CAMP_ID = D2.CAMP_ID , ARA_CAMPCHL E LEFT JOIN ARA_CHLEML E1 ON E.CAMP_ID = E1.CAMP_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_CHLSMS E2 ON E.CAMP_ID = E2.CAMP_ID , ARA_CD_DTL F WHERE 1=1 AND A.STR_ID = #{strid} AND B.STR_ID = A.STR_ID AND C.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID AND D.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID AND E.CAMP_ID = B.CAMP_ID AND F.MST_CD = 'C007' AND F.DTL_CD = D1.CPN_TYP AND B1.CAMP_ID IS NOT NULL AND B2.CAMP_ID IS NOT NULL

SELECT /* Ara2Str.giveCouponList */ A.STR_ID AS STR_ID , A.CAMP_ID AS CAMP_ID , A.USR_ID AS USR_ID , A.USD_STR_ID AS USD_STR_ID , A.CPN_TYP AS CPN_TYP , A1.DTL_NM AS CPN_TYP_NM , A1.DTL_DESC AS CPN_TYP_DESC , A.CPN_PHS AS CPN_PHS , A2.DTL_NM AS CPN_PHS_NM , A2.DTL_DESC AS CPN_PHS_DESC , A.CPN_NO AS CPN_NO FROM ARA_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA_CD_DTL A1 ON A1.MST_CD = 'C007' AND A1.DTL_CD = A.CPN_TYP LEFT JOIN ARA_CD_DTL A2 ON A2.MST_CD = 'C002' AND A2.DTL_CD = A.CPN_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND A.STR_ID = #{strid} AND A.CPN_PHS = '1' AND A.USR_ID = -1 AND A.USD_STR_ID = -1 ORDER BY A.CPN_NO ASC

SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectCampId */ B.CTR_ID , B.STR_ID , B.TODAY , B.MAX_CPN_MST , SEQ_CAMP.NEXTVAL AS CAMP_ID FROM ( SELECT LPAD(A.CTR_ID, 2, '0') AS CTR_ID , LPAD(A.STR_ID, 3, '0') AS STR_ID , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') AS TODAY , MAX(A2.CPN_MST) AS MAX_CPN_MST FROM ARA_STR A LEFT JOIN ARA_CAMP A1 ON A1.STR_ID = A.STR_ID LEFT JOIN ARA_OFFCPN A2 ON A2.CAMP_ID = A1.CAMP_ID AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(A2.CRE_DTTM, 'YYMMDD') WHERE 1=1 AND A.STR_ID = #{strid} GROUP BY A.CTR_ID , A.STR_ID ) B WHERE 1=1

SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectCouponList */ A.STR_ID , A.CAMP_ID , A.USR_ID , A.USD_STR_ID , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A1.DTL_NM AS TYP_NM , A1.DTL_DESC AS TYP_DESC , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_PHS , A2.DTL_NM AS PHS_NM , A2.DTL_DESC AS PHS_DESC , A.CPN_NO , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DTTM FROM ARA_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA_CD_DTL A1 ON A1.MST_CD = 'C007' AND A1.DTL_CD = A.CPN_TYP LEFT JOIN ARA_CD_DTL A2 ON A2.MST_CD = 'C002' AND A2.DTL_CD = A.CPN_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND A.STR_ID = #{strid} AND A.CPN_PHS = '1' AND A.USR_ID = -1 AND A.USD_STR_ID = -1 ORDER BY A.CAMP_ID ASC , A.CPN_NO ASC

SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectPayCpnList */ A.STR_ID , A.CAMP_ID , A.USR_ID , A.USD_STR_ID , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A1.DTL_NM AS TYP_NM , A1.DTL_DESC AS TYP_DESC , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_PHS , A2.DTL_NM AS PHS_NM , A2.DTL_DESC AS PHS_DESC , A.CPN_NO , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DTTM FROM ARA_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA_CD_DTL A1 ON A1.MST_CD = 'C007' AND A1.DTL_CD = A.CPN_TYP LEFT JOIN ARA_CD_DTL A2 ON A2.MST_CD = 'C002' AND A2.DTL_CD = A.CPN_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND A.CPN_PHS = '3' AND A.USD_STR_ID = #{strid} ORDER BY A.CAMP_ID ASC , A.CPN_NO ASC

SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectNoPayCpnList */ A.STR_ID , A.CAMP_ID , A.USR_ID , A.USD_STR_ID , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A1.DTL_NM AS TYP_NM , A1.DTL_DESC AS TYP_DESC , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_PHS , A2.DTL_NM AS PHS_NM , A2.DTL_DESC AS PHS_DESC , A.CPN_NO , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPD_DTTM FROM ARA_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA_CD_DTL A1 ON A1.MST_CD = 'C007' AND A1.DTL_CD = A.CPN_TYP LEFT JOIN ARA_CD_DTL A2 ON A2.MST_CD = 'C002' AND A2.DTL_CD = A.CPN_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND A.STR_ID = #{strid} AND A.CPN_PHS = '2' ORDER BY A.CAMP_ID ASC , A.CPN_NO ASC

SELECT /* Ara2Str.selectTempCalcList */ A.STR_ID AS STR_ID , A.CPN_PHS AS CPN_PHS , A1.DTL_NM AS PHS_NM , CASE WHEN A.CPN_PHS = '1' THEN '[미제공]' WHEN A.CPN_PHS = '2' THEN '[미사용]' WHEN A.CPN_PHS = '3' THEN TO_CHAR(USD_STR_ID) ELSE '정산완료됨' END AS USD_STR_NO , A.USD_STR_ID AS USD_STR_ID , COUNT(1) AS USD_CNT , SUM(A.CPN_MNY) AS USD_SUM FROM ARA_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA_CD_DTL A1 ON A1.MST_CD = 'C002' AND A1.DTL_CD = A.CPN_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND A.STR_ID = #{strid} AND A.CPN_PHS NOT IN ( 8, 9 ) /* 정산완료됨 */ GROUP BY A.STR_ID , A.CPN_PHS , A1.DTL_NM , A.USD_STR_ID ORDER BY A.CPN_PHS DESC , A.USD_STR_ID ASC
